function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased reliance on local suppliers may lead to a decrease in the quality of products","Impact":"Lower quality products may affect the competitiveness of the retailer","Mitigation":"Implement quality control measures and supplier evaluation processes","Technologies":"Supplier management software, quality control systems","People":"Retailers, customers","Owner":"Retailers, supply chain management team"},{"Description":"Decrease in the value of transactions with existing suppliers due to diversification","Impact":"Loss of incentive for suppliers to develop close relationships with retailers","Mitigation":"Strengthen communication and collaboration with existing suppliers, explore other forms of value exchange","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, data analytics for supplier relationship management","People":"Retailers, existing suppliers","Owner":"Retailers, supply chain management team"},{"Description":"Shift towards online shopping highlights the need for strong customer service and online presence","Impact":"Failure to meet customer needs online may lead to loss of customer loyalty","Mitigation":"Invest in customer service training, enhance online platforms for improved customer experience","Technologies":"Customer relationship management systems, online shopping platforms","People":"Retailers, online customers","Owner":"Retailers, customer service team"}]}
